content.rendered:
Directed by Seema Pahwa

Written by Seema Pahwa

Cast Supriya Pathak(Savitri). Konkona Sen Sharma(Seema). Parambrata Chattopadhyay(Nishant / Young Ramprasad). Vikrant Massey(Rahul). Manoj Pahwa(Gajraj). Vinay Pathak(Pankaj). Ninad Kamat(Manoj). Anubha Fatehpuria(Rani). Sarika Singh(Dhaani). Brijendra Kala(Prakash). Deepika Amin(Sushma). Divya Jagdale(Sulekha). Sadiya Siddiqui(Pratibha). Shrikant Verma(Basant). Vineet Kumar(Mamaji). Rajendra Gupta(Tauji). Yamini Das(Mamiji). Pushpa Joshi(Buaji). Alka Badola Kaushal(Sheila). Manukriti Pahwa(Bittoo). Sawan Tank(Samay). Mahesh Sharma(Vinod). Naseeruddin Shah(Ramprasad). Sanah Kapoor(Young Savitri). Rakhi Jaiswal(Bhabhi (as Rakhee Jaiswal)). Ravish Srivastava(Neighbourer)

Language Hindi

Producers Raghav Gupta. Supriya Guru. Roma Kandpal. Manish Mundra.

Production Drishyam Films. Jio Studios
